main event: A UFO sighting involving a bright colored sphere over Ashland, Kentucky on December 6, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as moving slowly from the horizon to overhead,The estimated speed of the object was between 750-1500 MPH,The total duration of the sighting was reported as 20 minutes,The object appeared circular in shape and approximately 30 feet in diameter,There was a very loud sound associated with the sighting.
witness description: witness details were to be filled in a questionnaire but no specific witness description provided.
